#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define _fast ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
#define LL long long int
#define s(a) scanf("%d",&a)

#define ss(a) scanf("%s",a)
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define fd(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
#define p(a) printf("%d",a)

#define ps(a) printf("%s",a)
#define pc(a) printf("%c",a)
#define ent printf("\n")
bool wayToSort(int i, int j) { return i > j; }
using namespace std;
LL n;
LL a[100009];
int prime[50];
long long pow_shit(long long a,int b)
{
    long long c=1.0;
    while(b--)
    {
        c=a*c;
    }
    return c;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,f=0,k=0;
	/**for(i=2;i<=60;i++)
    {   f=0;
        for(j=2;j*j<=i;j++)
        {
            if(i%j==0)
            {
                f=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(f==0)
            {prime[k]=i;
        k++;}
    }**/
    long double fac;
    s(t);
    w(t)
    {
        cin>>n;
        f=0;
        for( j=2;j<=60;++j)
		{
			long long b=(pow(n,1.0/j));
			if(pow_shit(b,j)==n||pow_shit(b+1,j)==n)
			{
				f=1;
				break;
			}
		}
        if(f==0)
        {
            cout<<"NO\n";
        }
        else
            cout<<"YES\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
